job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Apple Online Store
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtJoin the Apple Online Store team as a Senior Software Engineer Were looking for a highly motivated engineer to work in an exciting fastpaced environment delivering projects sought at improving the hugely successful Apple Online Stores ecommerce experience and features  wwwapplecomshop httpwwwapplecomshopltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtProgramming in Java Scala or other object oriented programming language with deep understanding of object oriented concepts and experience in Spring or other DI frameworksltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtDevelop multitier scalable highvolume performing multithreaded and reliable customer focussed web applicationsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtKnowledge and experience of serviceoriented architecturesltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt5  10 years overall Software EngineerDeveloper experienceltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt Demonstrated expertise in application securityltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtExpert knowledge of computer science with indepth understanding of data structures algorithms and software designltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtDemonstrated ability to achieve stretch goals in a highly innovative and fast paced environmentltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtSharp analytical abilities and proven design skillsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtStrong leadership abilities in driving operational excellence and best engineering practicesltbrgtltbrgtNICETOHAVEltbrgtltbrgt  Experience with high traffic eCommerce applications or online merchandising web sitesltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Solid understanding of software development methods and processes including Waterfall and Agile development practicesltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Excellent interpersonal and documentation skillsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtWe are looking for a self starting upbeat individual with excellent written and communication skills who is a great teammate but not afraid to question assumptions and take initiative As part of the AOS Applications Engineering team your responsibilities include building high throughput high performance reliable serverside web application architecture and features in SOA design working closely with other services engineering team UI engineering team and interacting with product design content QA and many other groups to lead and deliver world class ecommerce experience from merchandising to checkout on all platforms Web MOW and Native iOS in an exciting fastpaced environmentltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtWere looking for a hardworking and passionate person to join this amazing team if you feel this is you wed love to hear from youltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBachelors degree in Computer Science or Information Management is
